15/06/2023
For data storage, have a look at this guidance to decide optimal storage (try to avoid portable devices): https://icts.kuleuven.be/storagewijzer/en 

For data sharing, consider whether RDR is an option: https://www.kuleuven.be/rdm/en/rdr/rdr

12/06/2023
This has now been reset, so please upload the correct DMP now. The current DMP is a blank document with only questions and guidance.

05/06/2023
This document only contains the questions asked in a Data Management Plan, and the guidance. I see no actual text that you have written explaining with data your research will generate and how you will manage those. You need to provide an answer to each question in the DMP.

If you're not sure how to write this, then contact the RDM helpdesk and ask for someone to meet with you to discuss this.
